MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY16 postcode area of ST. Andrews. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown between 09:00am and 09:30am to install a generator and will be turning off supply again at 3:00pm to safely remove the generator and reconnect to mains supply due to a fault on our electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:12am on Wednesday, 24 March 2021
